Features

  1. ML-driven proxy
    management

    Selects and rotates proxies, evaluates which proxy pools work the best on a specific site, and gives you the highest success rate with the lowest response time possible.

  2. Dynamic browser
    fingerprinting

    Chooses the right combination of headers, cookies, browser attributes and proxies to appear as an organic user bypassing all target website blocks.

  3. ML-powered response
    recognition

    Creates an effective feedback loop between the web scraping results and the experimentation engine to determine the quality of the outcome.

  4. Auto-retry
    functionality

    In cases when your scraping request fails, our system chooses another combination of client device parameters and sends the request again.
